info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 01 at 2:54PM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN POLK...SOUTHWESTERN YELL AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 254 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Opal, or 13 miles northeast of Mena, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Gravelly... Muddy Creek WMA... Y City... Union Hill... Nola... Olio... Cedar Creek... Harvey... Boles... Parks... Blue Ball... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
